name: Abu Ja'far

name: Aladdin

name: Aladdin's Lamp
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead look at the top X cards of your library, put all but one of them on the bottom of your library in a random order, then draw a card. X can't be 0.

name: Aladdin's Ring
oracle_text: {8}, {T}: Aladdin's Ring deals 4 damage to any target.

—The Arabian Nights, Junior Classics trans.

name: Camel
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
As long as Camel is attacking, prevent all damage Deserts would deal to Camel and to creatures banded with Camel.
flavor_text: Everyone knew Walid was a pious man, for he had been blessed with many sons, many jewels, and a great many Camels.

name: City in a Bottle

Players can't cast spells or play lands with a name originally printed in the Arabian Nights expansion.

name: Cyclone
